verses.verse: דִּבְרֵי֙ <S%H1697><s%> The words קֹהֶ֣לֶת <S%H6953><s%> of the Preacher בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> of David מֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem

הֲבֵ֤ל <S%H1892><s%> Vanity הֲבָלִים֙ <S%H1892><s%> of vanities אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> saith קֹהֶ֔לֶת <S%H6953><s%> the Preacher הֲבֵ֥ל <S%H1892><s%> vanity הֲבָלִ֖ים <S%H1892><s%> of vanities הַכֹּ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> All הָֽבֶל׃ <S%H1892><s%> all [is] vanity

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What יִּתְר֖וֹן <S%H3504><s%> What profit לָֽאָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> hath a man בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲמָל֔וֹ <S%H5999><s%> of all his labour שֶֽׁיַּעֲמֹ֖ל <S%H5998><s%> which he taketh תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <S%H8121><s%> east side

דּ֤וֹר <S%H1755><s%> [One] generation הֹלֵךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> passeth away וְד֣וֹר <S%H1755><s%> and [another] generation בָּ֔א <S%H935><s%> comes וְהָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> but the earth לְעוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever עֹמָֽדֶת׃ <S%H5975><s%> abideth

וְזָרַ֥ח <S%H2224><s%> also ariseth הַשֶּׁ֖מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> The sun וּבָ֣א <S%H935><s%> goeth down הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> and the sun וְאֶ֨ל־ <S%H413><s%> to מְקוֹמ֔וֹ <S%H4725><s%> to his place שׁוֹאֵ֛ף <S%H7602><s%> and hasteth זוֹרֵ֥חַֽ <S%H2224><s%> where he arose ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

הוֹלֵךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> goeth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward דָּר֔וֹם <S%H1864><s%> toward the south וְסוֹבֵ֖ב <S%H5437><s%> and turneth about אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward צָפ֑וֹן <S%H6828><s%> unto the north סוֹבֵ֤ב ׀ <S%H5437><s%> swirling סֹבֵב֙ <S%H5437><s%> turning הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> it whirleth about continually הָר֔וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> The wind וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and סְבִיבֹתָ֖יו <S%H5439><s%> according to his circuits שָׁ֥ב <S%H7725><s%> returneth again הָרֽוּחַ׃ <S%H7307><s%> and the wind

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הַנְּחָלִים֙ <S%H5158><s%> All the rivers הֹלְכִ֣ים <S%H1980><s%> run אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> into the sea וְהַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> yet the sea אֵינֶ֣נּוּ <S%H369><s%> is not מָלֵ֑א <S%H4392><s%> [is] not full אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מְק֗וֹם <S%H4725><s%> unto the place שֶׁ֤הַנְּחָלִים֙ <S%H5158><s%> from whence the rivers הֹֽלְכִ֔ים <S%H1980><s%> come שָׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> There הֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> like שָׁבִ֖ים <S%H7725><s%> thither they return לָלָֽכֶת׃ <S%H1980><s%> flow

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> All things יְגֵעִ֔ים <S%H3023><s%> [are] full of labour לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יוּכַ֥ל <S%H3201><s%> cannot אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man לְדַבֵּ֑ר <S%H1696><s%> utter לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor תִשְׂבַּ֥ע <S%H7646><s%> is not satisfied עַ֙יִן֙ <S%H5869><s%> [it] the eye לִרְא֔וֹת <S%H7200><s%> with seeing וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor תִמָּלֵ֥א <S%H4390><s%> filled אֹ֖זֶן <S%H241><s%> nor the ear מִשְּׁמֹֽעַ׃ <S%H8085><s%> with hearing

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> how long שֶּֽׁהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> has been ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he שֶׁיִּהְיֶ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> has been וּמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> how long שֶׁנַּֽעֲשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> The thing that hath been it [is that] which shall be and that which is done ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he שֶׁיֵּעָשֶׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> [is] that which shall be done וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> there כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner חָדָ֖שׁ <S%H2319><s%> and [there is] no new תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <S%H8121><s%> [thing] under the sun

יֵ֥שׁ <S%H3426><s%> Is there דָּבָ֛ר <S%H1697><s%> [any] thing שֶׁיֹּאמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> whereof it may be said רְאֵה־ <S%H7200><s%> See זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this חָדָ֣שׁ <S%H2319><s%> fresh ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he כְּבָר֙ <S%H3528><s%> already הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> has existed לְעֹֽלָמִ֔ים <S%H5769><s%> of old time אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> Which הָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> has existed מִלְּפָנֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H6440><s%> which was before

אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> There זִכְר֖וֹן <S%H2146><s%> [There is] no remembrance לָרִאשֹׁנִ֑ים <S%H7223><s%> of former וְגַ֨ם <S%H1571><s%> and also לָאַחֲרֹנִ֜ים <S%H314><s%> of [things] that are to come שֶׁיִּהְי֗וּ <S%H1961><s%> will occur לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יִהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> will come לָהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> like זִכָּר֔וֹן <S%H2146><s%> [things] neither shall there be [any] remembrance עִ֥ם <S%H5973><s%> Among שֶׁיִּהְי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> will occur לָאַחֲרֹנָֽה׃ <S%H314><s%> with [those] that shall come after פ

אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I קֹהֶ֗לֶת <S%H6953><s%> I the Preacher הָיִ֥יתִי <S%H1961><s%> have been מֶ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> was king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> over Israel בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem

וְנָתַ֣תִּי <S%H5414><s%> And I gave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לִבִּ֗י <S%H3820><s%> my heart לִדְר֤וֹשׁ <S%H1875><s%> to seek וְלָתוּר֙ <S%H8446><s%> and search out בַּֽחָכְמָ֔ה <S%H2451><s%> by wisdom עַ֛ל <S%H5921><s%> concerning כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> that נַעֲשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> concerning all [things] that are done תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> under heaven ה֣וּא ׀ <S%H1931><s%> he עִנְיַ֣ן <S%H6045><s%> travail רָ֗ע <S%H7451><s%> this sore נָתַ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> given אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> hath God לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> to the sons הָאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> of man לַעֲנ֥וֹת <S%H6031><s%> to be exercised בּֽוֹ׃

רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <S%H7200><s%> I have seen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַֽמַּעֲשִׂ֔ים <S%H4639><s%> all the works שֶֽׁנַּעֲשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> that are done תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> under the sun וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold הַכֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> all הֶ֖בֶל <S%H1892><s%> and behold all [is] vanity וּרְע֥וּת <S%H7469><s%> and vexation רֽוּחַ׃ <S%H7307><s%> of spirit

מְעֻוָּ֖ת <S%H5791><s%> [That which is] crooked לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יוּכַ֣ל <S%H3201><s%> cannot לִתְקֹ֑ן <S%H8626><s%> be made straight וְחֶסְר֖וֹן <S%H2642><s%> and that which is wanting לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יוּכַ֥ל <S%H3201><s%> cannot לְהִמָּנֽוֹת׃ <S%H4487><s%> be numbered

דִּבַּ֨רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> I communed אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with לִבִּי֙ <S%H3820><s%> with mine own heart לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying אֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> I הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold הִגְדַּ֤לְתִּי <S%H1431><s%> Lo I am come to great estate וְהוֹסַ֙פְתִּי֙ <S%H3254><s%> and have gotten חָכְמָ֔ה <S%H2451><s%> more wisdom עַ֛ל <S%H5921><s%> more כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לְפָנַ֖י <S%H6440><s%> than all [they] that have been before עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> than יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> me in Jerusalem וְלִבִּ֛י <S%H3820><s%> yea my heart רָאָ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> experience הַרְבֵּ֖ה <S%H7235><s%> had great חָכְמָ֥ה <S%H2451><s%> of wisdom וָדָֽעַת׃ <S%H1847><s%> and knowledge

וָאֶתְּנָ֤ה <S%H5414><s%> And I gave לִבִּי֙ <S%H3820><s%> my heart לָדַ֣עַת <S%H3045><s%> to know חָכְמָ֔ה <S%H2451><s%> wisdom וְדַ֥עַת <S%H3045><s%> and to know הוֹלֵל֖וֹת <S%H1947><s%> madness וְשִׂכְל֑וּת <S%H5531><s%> and folly יָדַ֕עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> I perceived שֶׁגַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> that this זֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> this ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he רַעְי֥וֹן <S%H7475><s%> also is vexation רֽוּחַ׃ <S%H7307><s%> of spirit

כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> Because בְּרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> For in much חָכְמָ֖ה <S%H2451><s%> wisdom רָב־ <S%H7227><s%> in abundance כָּ֑עַס <S%H3708><s%> grief וְיוֹסִ֥יף <S%H3254><s%> and he that increaseth דַּ֖עַת <S%H1847><s%> knowledge יוֹסִ֥יף <S%H3254><s%> increaseth מַכְאֽוֹב׃ <S%H4341><s%> sorrow
